strapiPost.title: Grand Opening of Rogers Clinic Offers Subscription Based Healthcare Option
strapiPost.content:
An innovative new clinic is shaking up the healthcare industry in Rogers by cutting out the insurance companies.

  • Subscription-based: Simplified Health runs on a subscription model of $59/month for adults, $29/month for kids, and allows for unlimited doctor visits without the copays and insurance bills associated with traditional medical systems.
  • Price transparency: Dr. Blake Hansen said through cutting out the insurance companies, he can be more transparent about what care will cost, likely saving patients money and giving them the opportunity to take back control of their healthcare and finances.

Check out Simplified Health HERE.
